movies.title: Spiderman (2002)
movies.description: After being bitten by a genetically-modified spider, a shy teenager gains spider-like abilities that he uses to fight injustice as a masked superhero and face a vengeful enemy.
movies.stars: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Willem Dafoe

movies.title: Spiderman 2 (2004)
movies.description: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius.
movies.stars: Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Alfred Molina
